bioconda.name: bioconductor-chipseqr
bioconda.summary: Identifying Protein Binding Sites in High-Throughput Sequencing Data

biotools.summary: Identify protein binding sites from ChIP-seq and nucleosome positioning experiments. The model used to describe binding events was developed to locate nucleosomes but it is flexible enough to handle other types of experiments as well.

bioschemas.name: ChIPseqR
bioschemas.summary: Identify protein binding sites from ChIP-seq and nucleosome positioning experiments. The model used to describe binding events was developed to locate nucleosomes but it is flexible enough to handle other types of experiments as well.
